fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Trade, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trans-European Networks, Communication
eu_initiatives: Strategy 2020, Horizon 2020 and all other European project related to social cohesion.
organisation_name: European Network for Social Innovation and Solidarity (ENSIS)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Towards a social Europe… 
 
The European Network for Social Innovation and Solidarity (ENSIS) brings together local, regional, national and Europe-wide organisations within the social sector (whether professionally-staffed or based on volunteers) as well as not for profit initiatives, committed to a collective solidarity and wishing to develop a social Europe through programmes of social innovation.
